publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8142 Jamie Hepburn: Rebekah’s Story—That the Parliament congratulates seven-year-old author Rebekah Machray from Kilsyth, on her recently published book, Rebekah’s Story; regards its publication as particularly important because it details the effects of living with type 1 diabetes and is of the view that it will help other children with this condition understand and come to terms with it; commends the charitable nature of the publication, with all proceeds going directly to Yorkhill Children’s Foundation; applauds the efforts of Rebekah’s parents, who organised a dinner and auction that raised £7,000 for the foundation, and wishes them the best of luck in trying to raise awareness and funding to combat this disease.
